extension.name: Event Calendar Links
extension.description: Replaces the calendar links section for CiviCRM events.
extension.comments: This extension is liberal port of "CiviCRM Add to Calendar" Drupal module (https://www.drupal.org/project/civicrm_add_to_calendar) as a native CiviCRM extension. It can therefore be used with Drupal, WordPress, or any other CMS with which CiviCRM is integrated.
